inn1.comm: Two slips in place. Full delivery outside off, driven to mid-off
gets forward to defend the length delivery
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
really full delivery, mistimes the drive towards mid-off
Shout for lbw. Saved by the height. It landed on a length on the off and middle line and straightened. Tharanga was shouldering arms and the ball came in to hit the back thigh.
gets forward to push it towards mid-off.
short and wide, Dilshan loses his bottom-hand grip on the bat but goes through with his slashed cut to right of wide third man
length delivery on the off and middle, Dilshan was shaping for an on-the-up shot but changes mind and pushes the ball to the off side
fuller and Dilshan goes for the big off drive, doesn't quite time it as well as he would have liked it but gets the placement right - well to the left of mid-off
kicks up from a length, around off and middle line, Tharanga was leaning forward to defend, is surprised by the extra bounce and jabs it away of his handle
on the pads this time, tucked behind square-leg
fuller, on the off and middle line, driven straight to mid-off
full delivery, Dilshan tries to swing it over square-leg but doesn't connect; will pick up a leg bye
full and well outside off stump, Tharanga reaches out to squeeze it along the ground to second slip
back of length, just outside off, Tharanga presses back to cut it down to wide third man
shortish, just outside off, cut to right of third man for a single .. third man is standing very wide, almost at deep backward point
outside off stump, punched of the back foot and there is a fumble at point by Chibhabha.. he should have covered that ..
fullish and down the leg side, brushes the pad en route to the keeper. Dilshan missed the opportunity to collect a boundary with a glance shot there. he did try but made no contact
leans forward to push the length delivery to covers
length delivery that straightens on the off stump line, steered to point
kicks up from short of length, jabbed away to the on side, behind the wicket
Bang. The first four of the game. Width on offer and Dilshan crashes it through covers. He just takes couple of steps down the track after he completed the shot, and admired his work
Whack. Why would you offer width and bowl short to Dilshan? Why? Please twitter me your answer. Dilshan flays this one to cover point boundary
Oh well. Here we go again. Errs on width and length. Dilshan blasts it over extra cover. thank you, come again.
outside off stump and Tharanga gets into a bad position to play the punchy stroke through point and as a result edges it down to third man
hmmm .. tries the bouncer and Dilshan goes for the pull. There is a top edge and all Zimbabwe fielders get excited as they see Taibu dive to his left but the ball was well clear of the keeper
fuller, on a length, on the middle stump line, pushed back down the track and Mpofu deflects it, unintentionally,to the stumps behind him. Tharanga was home
slower one, DIlshan adjusts and works it to right of Utseya at square-leg
cuts it straight to point.
slower one, on the middle and leg, turned to square-leg
stays back to cut this one hard but can't beat the point fielder
Short in length and it bounces outside off, Dilshan slashes it to third-man boundary. Not completely controlled - partly steered, party edged
Well very wide outside off but Dilshan chases it  but can't get wood on leather
And this is why he chased the previous wide. Another short delivery well outside off and Dilshan thumps it to the point boundary.
Did we see a perfect copy-book defense there? I think we did. I am calling my eye doctor now just in case.
Back to regular programming. Dilshan goes for a fierce pull, he wants to send it out of the country but is through his shot early. And gets an edge to his body
cuts this one to wide third man for a single that will help him retain the strike. Smart no?
leans forward to drive the length delivery to covers
fuller around off and middle, driven again to covers
pushes this wide of mid-on for a single
in the channel outside off, pushes it past first slip, down to third man

the slow bouncer ... and Dilshan goes for the pull but doesn't connect. There was an appeal for a catch .. Did it go off the arm? The bowler thought that the ump Rudi nodded in agreement with his appeal and had started celebrating when Rudi told him no mate .. not out
Can't blame Mpofu for this eh.. He tried another bouncer after what happened in the last delivery. Result? The ball was picked up from the square-leg boundary. Fiercely pulled.
gets forward to mistime the drive to mid-off
leans forward to work this one to midwicket
just outside off stump, steered to backward point
Thump. He was actually struggling out there for timing so far. However, this time, every thing came on well. He leaned forward to hit it on the up and over mid-off
square drives this through the off-side field
in the channel outside off and Tharanga is beaten, trying to run it down to third man. Ah that lust for the last-ball single .. I tell ya..!
on the off stump line, guided to backward point
tries the heave across the line and edges it to his front pad.
slower, short in length outside off, cuts it down to third man
guides this short of length delivery to point
on a length around off, pushed out to cover
slower off cutter, moves towards middle stump line, pushed to short extra cover region for a quick single
rushes down the track, gets outside the line of the leg stump and lifts it in the air but between the non striker and the mid-off fielder (Charles Coventry)
in the channel just outside off, Taibu was standing up to the stumps and there were no slips in place, and Tharanga slashes it through the vacant slip cordon
Crack of doom! short and slightly wide and Tharanga unfurls a cracking cut shot.
drives this one wide of mid-on for a single
really full on the middle, driven to mid-off

Almost caught by Utseya at short midwicket It was a back-of-length delivery on the middle and off, Dilshan tried to wrist it across the line and ended up clipping low to the right of Utseya who flung himself diagonally forward but couldn't reach..
short in length and outside off stump, cut to left of backward point where Taylor fumbles
fuller, around off and middle, jabs it down the track
turns this one to backward square-leg for a single
short in length ,cut hard but straight to backward point
flicks this past square-leg for a single
goes back and steers to backward point
on the middle stump line, tapped back to Price who follow-throughs on and glares at Dilshan
skips down the track and drives to covers
slightly short in length, Dilshan rocks back to cut it past backward point
arm ball on the middle stump line, punched down to long-on
turns in to the middle, eased down to long-on
turns this to square-leg
just outside off, runs it down to third man

Slips to the leg and middle line, Dilshan clears the front foot and swings it high and well to the right of Taylor at deep square-leg region. Taylor ran to his left and lunged out but couldn't get close to the ball
works this through the on side and will come back for the second run
short in length, straightens just outside off, Dilshan tries to late cut it and is beaten
Dilshan continues to indulge himself. He gets forward and swings the full delivery over wide midwicket
presses back to cut this to third man for another last-ball single
outside off stump, pushed out to the off side
leans across to defend to the off side
on the middle and it straightens,. Dilshan tries to work it to the on side and gets a leading edge back down the track
stays back to dab it to backward point
Nagging line and length continues from Price. Dilshan steers it to backward point
another tight delivery on the middle, Dilshan tries to steal his favourite last-ball single and even rushes down the track but is sent back by Tharanga. The ball wasn't far away from short midwicket
short in length, just outside off, chopped down to backward point
bangs it in short and there is no protection at deep square-leg. And that's exactly where Tharanga sends the ball with a pull shot
around the off stump, from back of length ,chopped to backward point
And again. Two men prowling at the point region
length delivery around off, driven to long-off
Wallop! Full delivery on the middle and Dilshan clears the front leg and smashes it over long-on.
leans forward to defend it back to Price
goes back to deflect it to backward square-leg
gets forward to defend to covers
slows up the pace, bit more flight, driven to long-off
arm ball on the middle stump line, punched to long-off
stays back to work this to midwicket
turns to the middle stump line but Dilshan backs away outside leg, makes room, and cuts it past backward point
on the middle and leg, turned to backward square-leg fielder
leans back to cut to backward point
goes back to clip it to square-leg
Edged past the stumps. It was flighted around off stump line, Tharanga is late on the off drive and pushes outside the  line as well and edges it past the leg stump
tossed up and Tharanga stabs it back down the track
on the leg stump line and this time there is a short fine-leg in place and Dilshan sweeps straight to him
on the off stump line, punched to covers
quicker but slips towards leg stump, swept away for a single
flighted on a length, pushed down to long-on
leans forward to ping long-off
quickish, flatter, on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
leans forward to squeeze the full delivery to backward point
and this time presses back to cut the short-of-length delivery past point
Lovely. He sashays down the track and drives inside out, against the turn, through covers for a fab boundary
turns this one to backward square-leg fielder
goes right back, backs away a touch, and punches to long-off
flighted around off, driven to long-off
leans forward to ping long-on
leans back to cut it towards deep point
goes for the paddle sweep but fails to connect and is hit on the body.  Taibu appeals for lbw but that was turning past the off stump
moves forward to drive to long-off
turns in to middle, defended to the off
Almost caught at long-on Dilshan rushes down the track and lofts to long-on. Mpofu back-pedaled near the boundary and stepped over the boundary as the ball sailed over
Stumped! Done in by the floater. Dilshan was down the track for the big shot but the ball drifted away and he ended up chasing it well away from his body and missed. Taibu did the rest
leans forward to defend
gets forward to push it to covers
flighted full around off, driven to Utseya
leans forward to play it down to long-on
flighted full, driven to long-on for a single
turns in from outside off, jabbed to square-leg
spins away from DC who punches it back to the bowler
fuller, on the middle and leg, swept away for a single
tossed up, full in length, driven, along the ground, past the diving bowler
cuts this one for a single
moves down the track and on drives to long-on
turns this to midwicket
turns towards off stump, pushed back to the bowler
leans forward to wrist it past square-leg for a single
Shot. It straightened outside from short of length and Chandimal rocked back to cut it past backward point
turns in towards middle and off, squeezed of the outside edge to point
leans forward to defend back to the bowler
flighted legbreak, Tharanga stretches forward to defend
tossed up ever so slowly, flicked to short midwicket
googly that breaks away from the off stump, nudged wide of short third man
flighted full outside off, driven to long-off
just outside off, steered to point
spins in from outside off, worked to short midwicket

Utseya takes his second wicket. He floated it outside off and got it to straighten as well. Chandimal, who had cut a similar delivery for couple of runs earlier, went for the cut shot again. But this time the ball flew straight to backward point. Utseya wins this mini-battle.
just outside off stump, turned to short midwicket
on the middle stump line, dabbed wide of midwicket
on the off stump line, Tharanga checks his shot and the ball rolls away to short cover
goes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
fuller, around off and middle line, driven to sweeper cover
around the off stump line, pushed towards long-off
flighted delivery, again a tad overpitched, driven to deep cover
turns to the middle and leg line, dabbed to square-leg
driven to deep cover
worked away off the pads for a single
offbreak, pitching middle and leg, turning away, defended back to the bowler
cut away to wide of point for a single
pushed down to long-on for a single
flighted delivery on the pads, patted back to the bowler
pushed down to long-on for one
straying onto the pads, helped around the corner for one
charges at him, gets to the pitch of the ball, drives to long-off
looks for a forward defensive, gets an inside edge towards square leg
misfielded by Coventry at cover-point, allowing them a single
cut away, but finds cover-point
dances down the track, pushes it for one to long-off
driven to long-on for one
short ball, pulled away, on a half-volley to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, played back to the bowler
comes down the track and chips wide of long-off to come back for two
pushed to long-off for one
short, pulled away, gets a single to deep square leg
overpitched delivery, hit down to long-on for one
short, angled across, cut away for one

now that's a celebration. Soft dismissal, Kapu doesn't quite get to the pitch of a length ball and chips an easy return catch to Masakadza, who throws the ball in the air, and then lifts his shirt to show his vest with "just married" inscribed on it
length ball, around off, defended back
fullish delivery, driven straight to extra cover
steered away to third man this time
on the leg stump line, turned to the on side
turns towards middle, pushed back to Price
moves down the track, takes it on the full, and drives to mid-off
drops it short and Samaraweera pulls it to deep midwicket
backs away to the leg side and cuts through cover point
on the leg stump line, worked to the on side
length delivery on the off, driven to the off side
outside off stump, cut away to deep point
cuts in from just outside off, Samaraweera tries to cut it but edges it past the leg stump
slower one, off cutter, Tharanga fetches it from outside off and drags it to deep midwicket region
stays back, opens the bat-face and runs it to third man
full pitched around off, driven to long-off
drops it short and it has been pulled to deep midwicket
fetches it from around off and goes for the sweep but doesn't connect properly
on the leg and middle, fuller, deflected to short midwicket
moves down the track and works it wide of Utseya at midwicket
turns in from outside off, cut to sweeper cover
drifts just down the leg side and it rolls of the pad to short fine-leg region
short in length outside off, dabbed down to third man
from round the stumps to left-handed Tharanga who stabs it to covers
fuller, slower, driven again to Utseya at covers
back of length outside off, cut straight to backward point
full in length, around off stump, gets off strike with a drive to long-off
around the off stump, full in length, guided to backward point
turns down the leg side for a wide
works this past square-leg for a single
backs away outside leg, creates his own room and cuts the ball on the middle stump line to the point boundary
slower, more flight, on the middle and leg, turned quietly to midwicket
leans forward to push this towards long-on
turns in from outside off, cut to point
leans forward to defend to short extra cover
stays back to push it to midwicket
presses back to wrist it past square-leg

Done in the flight. Tharanga went down the track but couldn't get to the pitch of the ball and ended up slicing it towards long-off. Coventry rushed in from the deep and lunged forward to take a good catch
leans forward to drive to long-on
leans forward to turn it to midwicket
stays back to swat this one past square-leg
turns this slightly wide of midwicket for a quick single
turns in from outside off, nudged to backward point
flighted on the off, pushed back to the bowler
gets back to push it to point for a quick single
on the leg and middle, nudged to backward square-leg
on the middle, Mendis is cramped for room but manages to get away from the ball and punch it to covers
gets down the track and flicks it past square-leg
goes for the reverse sweep and though the top-hand comes of the handle, he goes through with the shot and sends the ball way over backward point
pushes this one behind the wicket on the off for a single
slightly short, cut to deep point for a single
It was a pretty short delivery actually if not a long hop. Mendis opened his stance and went for the pull but got more elevation than distance. Taylor moved in from deep midwicket to collect that
slightly short, cut to point
in the channel outside off stump, beaten on the drive
follows that good delivery with a wide one outside off stump
Not quite a catch but ..  short in length outside off, punched on the up to deep point region . it was in the air for a while and Cremer dived to his left at backward point but couldn't reach
full in length and well outside off, goes for the big cover drive and is beaten
just outside off stump, dabbed to point
reaches across and square-drives a full delivery on a bent knee .. couple of runs to deep backward point region
short in length, just outside off, run down to third man
works this past square-leg
stays back to punch it back to cremer
turns away form samaraweera who nudges it to point

Samaraweera is run out and he storms off Oh what a dreary mess. It was pushed past non-striker and the straight midwicket fielder moves to his left to cut it off and fumbles. Samaraweera thinks there is a single there and rushes down the track. Thirimanne turns, sees Samaraweera run in but stays put at his end. Both end up together. And the throw goes to Taibu. Gone!
lovely slider that lands around off stump and goes away .. past the outside edge
leans forward to defend to the off side
gets forward to work the ball to the on side
gets off the strike with a little dab shot this time
stays back to punch this one down to long-on
turns in from outside off, defended on the front foot
short in length, turned wide of midwicket for a single
on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket
short in length on the middle and off line, pushed out to covers
short delivery, guided to the left of backward point
cuts from the leg and middle, towards middle and off. the batsman is squared-up and it runs of the elbow ..towards third man
around off stump line, turned to cover point
turns in from outside off, pulled away in the air but falls short of deep midwicket fielder
leans forward to tap it to the on side for a single
turned to fine-leg .. wristed away with the spin
turns in from outside off, stabbed away
gets down the track and flicks to short midwicket
leans forward to defend
goes on with the arm, past the poke and hits the pad
on the middle and leg, driven to the straightish midwicket
on the middle stump line, driven to long-off
on the off stump line, eased to cover point for a single
gets down the track and lofts it towards long-on
moves outside leg, Mpofu follows him with a length delivery ,dabbed to square-leg

Another celebration .. this time like Brazilian footballer Bebeto ... It was the full delivery, almost a yorker, which has taken out the middle stump. The batsman was looking for the big hit. Mpofu does a movement like Bebeto - as if he is cradling a child
just outside off, dabbed wide of backward point for a single
moves right across the stumps and flicks the full delivery to short fine-leg fielder

Now Price and Mpofu do some stylish celebrations! It was a full delivery which has been square driven straight to point! Even as Mpofu cradles an imaginary baby, Taibu, who has just had a second child, envelops him with a hug. And Price joins in and he and Mpofu have a little dance - tapping each others' foot.
fires a bouncer and the batsman gets down under
floats it outside leg, swept straight to short fine-leg
leans forward to off drive for a single
slightly short in length around off, punched to covers
nagging line and length, just pushed back to him
breaks free with a neat hit. He stretched forward to loft it over long-off
full delivery on the leg and middle, turned to midwicket
on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
shortish delivery, pushed out to cover point
The slow off cutter  and it has been dragged down to deep square-leg
slower one from round the stumps, pushed to covers
gets forward to drive wide of cover fielder for a single
from wide of the crease, low dipping full toss, square driven to point
Remember Powerplay on and there aren't many fielders near the boundary. It was full delivery outside off and it has been blasted through covers
in trying to correct his line, he slips this down the leg side ..
on the middle and leg, driven to long-on
And then they were one. Price slowed up the pace and also gave it bit of air outside off.. Thushara went for the slog sweep and ended up dragging it to  deep midwicket
on the off stump line, turned to short midwicket
just outside the leg stump line, Fernand goes for the sweep and misses it ..

Taibu you beauty! It was nudged to say squarish short leg ... Fernando stepped down the track for a single and was sent back. He hadn't gone down too long but Taibu was very quick. Very alert. He dashed off, picked the ball, had already removed his right glove, and under-armed a direct hit!

inn2.comm: Two slips in.  Thushara starts off with a wide outside off.
again well outside off stump, close to being called a wide.
And this time its been called a wide.
back of length, just outside off stump, defended back down the track
short in length and outside off, punched to short cover
hmm.. another one well outside off and Tiffin must have thought about extending his arms
closer to the off, bursts from short of length and flies past the outside edge
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
banged in short and it kicks up outside off stump, Taylor allows it to pass through
full delivery this time, on the off and middle, pushed down the track and Fernando makes a half-stop
Superb shot. It was a short of length outside off, Taylor stood up on his toes, reached out away from his body and timed it gorgeously on the up through covers. Fab shot.
moves across to defend it towards short cover
run out chance missed .. It was pushed to right of Kapugedera at backward point. Kapugedera takes aim and fires the throw but misses the stumps at non-striker's end. Taylor was not even in the frame
back of length, pushed towards mid-on
on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
pushes this one to the off side
fuller, straighter, runs of the outer edge to third man .. Thushara holds his head
just outside off stump, defended to covers
full delivery on the off stump line, runs of the inner edge to square-leg
fullish, on the off stump line, Taylor chooses to stay back and defend the full delivery
just outside off stump, run down to third man
short in length, just outside off, left alone
short in length, bouncing delivery outside off, clipped to square-leg
slips in a slower one, pushed out to mid-on
down the leg side and runs away to fine-leg region for couple of leg byes
Masakadza's new wife must have winced. A bouncer on the leg stump line and he goes for the pull but gloves it behind for a leg-side catch to the keeper.
full delivery, slanting away, left alone
short in length, around off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
full in length around off stump, eased to point
hits the deck short of length and gets it bounce outside off, the batsman goes for the cut but the ball flies past the blade
full delivery on the middle, turned to the on side
full in length, straight , defended back down the track
outside off stump, run down to third man
full, straight and fast, Chibhaba just about manages to stab it of the inner edge
on a length around middle, pushed down to mid-on
banged in short outside off, chopped down to third man
full in length around middle and off, defended to covers
fullish, on the leg stump line, clipped behind square-leg
banged in short, tucked towards square-leg
the fiery bouncer, well directed at the body of Chibhabha who goes for the pull but top edges it over the keeper. Beaten for pace there

tries the slower one but slips it wide down the leg side and that runs to the boundary. Edged boundary and now a wide boundary.. Hmm ... I t landed in front of the keeper and turned sharply and went right between his legs!
pushes this one to covers
full delivery around off stump, pushed to covers
in the channel outside off stump, moves past the attempted defensive shot
full delivery, hint of inward movement, squeezed out to square-leg
fabulous off drive. It was a full-pitched delivery and Taylor creasmes it past the bowler
slower one outside off, dabbed towards gully
length delivery on the middle, pushed out to the off side of the pitch
sharp well-directed bouncer and Chibhabha hops to keep it down on the off side
full delivery just outside off, TAylor was caught at the crease, just pushes out at it and it runs of the inner edge
full in length and down the leg side
short in length ,cut to backward point
on the off stump line,. pushed out to backward point
Fullish delivery just outside leg and Chibhabha flicked it over the fine-leg fielder! Wonderful piece of timing.
short in length outside off, run down to third man
fuller in length, on the middle and leg, turned behind square-leg
full delivery, slower one, dipped rapidly on Taylor, who deflects it past square-leg
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
full delivery, tapped back down the pitch
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
short in length, punched to covers. fumble there .. taylor wanted a single but chibhaba sends him back ...And Taylor gets back in time
bouncer outside off stump, guided towards third man
lands outside leg, moves in, moves past the glance and runs of the thigh pad to fine-leg boundary
full delivery around off, driven uppishly towards mid-off
the slow bouncer on the leg and middle line, tucked behind square-leg
full in length, outside off, run down to third man
bouncer at the body, stabbed away to the on side
lands outside leg stump, moves in to hit the pad
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
short in length just outside off stump, guided to backward point
full delivery outside off, driven to covers
short delivery, is late on the pull but gets it past square-leg
slower, on the middle stump line, nudged to vacant spaces on the leg side for a single
banged in short outside off, chopped down to backward point
leans forward to push the length delivery to covers
Violence. Full delivery and Taylor lifts it to the long-off boundary. Crash!
outside off stump, steered to point
slightly slower, outside off, dabbed to point
Full delivery and Taylor lifts it just over mid-on. For a moment he must have thought he has holed out there but it clears the fielder
just outside off stump, run down to third man
one slip in. It turns in to middle and leg line, worked past square-leg

loud shout for a caught-behind decision The keeper reckons it hit the edge and then went off the batsman's boot. It turned in, hit the edge and did bounce on the front boot but also, perhaps hit the ground and the keeper dived to his right to take it. Not out is the verdict.
goes back to turn it to the on side
gets forward to tap it to short midwicket
presses right back to clip the off break to left of square-leg fielder
goes back to punch it away for a single
Imperious. He walked to the off side, fetched the length delivery from outside off and walloped it to wide long-on boundary
taps this one to square-leg for a single
full delivery outside off , square driven past point for couple of runs
slower leg cutter, pushed towards mid-on
full toss around off stump and that has been dismissed to the cover boundary. He knifed it through extra cover
The slower bouncer but Chibhabha waits, swivels and pulls it away to the square-leg boundary. Smashed!
leans across to defend the off break
on the middle stump line, fuller, pushed back to Randiv
goes right back to push it back to the bowler
spins in from outside off , moves past the defensive prod and hits the pad
goes right back to punch it down to long-on
flighted outside off, pushed to cover point
leans forward to drive to long-off
gets forward and across to defend to the off side
lands on a length, straightens on the middle and almost traps his man. Taylor just about gets an inside edge on to his pad
flighted full, driven to long-off
goes back to push it to covers
gets forward to push to cover point for a quick single. There is a direct hit but Taylor is home
stretches well forward to squeeze it to point
top spinner around off, nudged to square-leg
leans forward to push it through cover point
spins in to the middle and leg , rolls away of the pad
turns in from outside off, deflected to short midwicket
Neatly done. He fetched it from outside off and paddle-swept it for couple of runs
leg break on the leg and middle line, worked through the on side
stretches forward to defend the leg break
goes right back to punch this one back to Jeevan
"aiyo!" says the keeper as Taylor connects with a paddle sweep
leans forward to drive to long-on
wrong one from outside off stump, pushed to covers.
goes right back to turn it towards backward square-leg
spins in, turned again to the same fielder
What a lovely top spinner! It landed on the middle stump line and bounced on straight .. The batsman was in trouble and it goes of the outer edge to gully
gets forward to tap this one down the track
stays back to punch it to long-on

another top spinner but what a response from Chibhabha! he was in trouble last time around against the top spinner but was extremely alert this time. He stayed beside the line, leaned back and cut it well to the left of backward point. Top shot sir
stretches forward to ping long-on
leans across to drive to sweeper cover
stretches forward to push it to the off side
short in length and turning away from Taylor who cuts it over backward point
back of length again, cut away to deep point
on the leg stump line, turned to fine-leg region. 50 up for Taylor. Very well-crafted knock.
leans forward to defend
goes back to clip it to square-leg
turns in from outside off, squeezed out to point
quicker, on the off stump line, pushed back down the track
flighted on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
gets forward to drive through the off side
clips this one behind square-leg
on the off and middle line, driven to left of Jeevan who makes a diving stop
spins in from outside leg, flicked past square-leg
breaks back in from short of length, Chibhabha is late in picking it but adjusts to punch it to cover
loopy full delivery on middle, driven to long-on
gets forward to on drive
stays back to punch it to long-on
turns in from outside off, pushed to short cover
turns in to middle and leg, worked to square-leg
just outside off stump, goes for the cut and is beaten. The keeper doesn't collect cleanly
tight delivery on the off and middle, pushed to the off side
low full toss around off, driven to short extra cover
stays back  to punch to right of extra cover
steps out and drives to long-on for a single
full delivery on the middle, eased to long-on
ah! it was a short delivery around off and middle, taylor opened the bat-face, crouched and late cut it to third man
slightly low on the leg and middle line, whipped to deep midwicket
AIyo! screams the keeper again as the off break keeps a tad low as it spins in towards middle stump and Taylor just about manages ti keep it out
gets forward to push it to the on side and Dilshan moves to his right to make a diving stop
on the legs, turned behind square-leg
on the off stump line, goes on straight, worked to midwicket
Another fine topspinner, goes on straight outside off and beats the cut shot
Cut down to deep point. Just two runs from that Dilshan over
turns in from just outside leg stump and hits the pad ..
rushes down the track and lifts it to long-on
flighted outside leg and Taylor sweeps it really fine. Neatly done. He crouched low and swept it really fine
slider on the off and middle line, punched down to long-on
tossed outside leg stump .. wide
googly from short of length, punched to sweeper cover
lands just outside leg stump and swept away for a single
on the middle, pushed back to Dilshan
stretches well forward to ease it to long-on
slower, bit more air, driven to long-off.. 50 for Chibhabha. There is some justice left in the world and all that. Sorry. Couldn't resist that
outside off stump, driven down to sweeper cover
quicker, on the legs, turned to fine-leg region
tossed full, deflected to short midwicekt
Keeper is standing up to the stumps for the mediumpacer. It cut back in from just outside off, punched back to the bowler
around the off stump line, cut away to backward point
slower, just outside off, run down to third man
length delivery outside off, run down to third man
slower, full in length, squeezed to backward point
short in length just outside off, squirted to third man
leans forward to push it away
on the middle stump line, whipped to deep midwicket
rotates the strike with a drive to long-off
slower, on the off, eased down to long-on
on the middle stump line, straightens, pushed to left of short midwicket where Kapu makes a diving stop
reaches outside off and wrists it to long-on
back of length just outside off, run down to third man
Thrash! Full delivery and Chibhabha drives to right of sweeper cover

run out missed It was pushed to the off side .. to wards short point region .. after confusion they start for the single and then the non-striker has a change of mind. The keeper  had rushed after the ball, picked and hurled the throw but missed the stumps at the striker's end. And chibhahba got home in time. . they then take the single
leans forward to defend
gets forward to off drive and Kapu dives to his left to stop
punches this one to long-on for a single. Splendid partnership so far. In control
on the off stump line, pushed down the track
on the leg stump line, moves past the prod and strikes the pad
on the off stump line driven to long-off

Plumb in front. It landed on a length and skidded on straight .. Chibhabha went back and tried to work it to the leg side but was beaten by the lack of turn. It went on straight and skidded quickly to catch him in front ...
leans forward to drive to sweeper cover
on the middle and off line, punched to long0on for another single.
slower one, outside off, run down to third man
fullish, on the leg side, rolls of the pad to the keeper
full in length around off, pushed back to Fernando
short in length, extra bounce, Taibu edges it to the off side.. he was trying to clip it to square-leg
gets forward to push it away .. Fernando is bowling it fast and straight
full delivery on the off stump line, hint of inward movement, nothing alarming, driven back to the bowler
Whack! Dilshan, who has been bowling full on a length so far, drops it short and Taylor pulls it to the cowcorner
leans forward to work it past midwicket
floats it full, pushed back to the bowler
fetches it from outside off and paddles it to fine-leg
on the middle stump line, on driven to long-on
just outside off stump, swept away for a single
length delivery on the middle, pushed out to mid-on
full delivery outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
low full toss, dipping, pushed to left of mid-off for a single
back of length just outside off, goes for the cut but mistimes it to point. No ball and so a free hit coming up
goes for the yorker, Taibu clears the front foot and squeezes it to midwicket and they rush for couple of runs
short in length just outside off, guided to backward point
just outside off stump, picks a single with a dab to third man
on the off stump line, paddled away for a single
couple of steps forward and turns it to midwicket
sends this one down to long-on
swats it away but straight to short midwicket
on the middle stump line, tapped to right of short midwicket for a quick single
gets down the track and drives to long-on.
length delivery on the middle, worked to short midwicket
lands just outside leg, moves in towards middle, defended to the on side
short in length outside off, run down to Randiv at third man
full in length on the middle, squeezed to square-leg
on the leg stump line, rolls of the pad
just outside off stump, nudged to backward point
plays the paddle sweep to rotate the strike
on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
turns from outside off, dabbed to Fernando at short third man
floated full outside off stump, driven wide of sweeper cover
stretches well forward to defend
topspinner outside off stump, defended on the front foot
bouncer on the leg stump line, allowed to go over him
just outside off stump, run down to third man
short in length, around off stump, Taibu dropped it close on the off side and they rush across for the quick single
full delivery outside leg stump, it would have been a wide but Taylor reaches out to play the lap shot .. sort of paddle it away and edges it to fine-leg region
short pitched delivery outside off and Taylor cuts to deep point
short in length, around off stump line, dabbed to backward point
leans forward to turn it to square-leg
spins in from outside off, worked behind square-leg
topspinner from round the stumps, pushed out to backward point
drops it short and Taibu cracks it wide of sweeper cover.. . Tharanga makes a sliding stop near the boundary
gets forward to deflect it to midwicket
just outside off, skids away and Taibu is beaten on the cut
gets forward to ping long-on
flighted on the off and middle, driven with the turn to long-off
stretches forward to ease it to long-on
lands on a length on the middle and leg and straightens. Taibu thought it would turn away from him and adjusts to the straightening by jabbing it  to square-leg
moves forward to drive to long-off
lands outside leg and straightens to hit the pad
on the middle stump line, punched to long-on for yet another single
clipped to right of Kapugedera at short midwicket for a quick single
backs away to cut it to deep point
Another easy single out to long-on. cool, calm and collected
squeezes this to short third man region for a single..
leans forward to drive to covers
he likes those sweep shots and turns over the strike to Brendan
fetches the leg break from just outside off and wrists it calmly down to long-on
lands it outside leg , swept to short fine-leg

Run out of Taibu missed It was a short delivery and Taibu cut to left of over where Dilshan stops but fumbles while trying to release the throw. .. The ball slips out of his hand .. Taibu would have been easily run out .. as there was confusion between the two batsmen over the single and Taibu hadn't advanced much
retains the strike with yet another on drive
on the middle stump, wristed to short fine-leg fielder
turns in from outside off and strikes him on the pad just outside off. ..
slows up the pace, floats it on the off and middle, driven to long-on. On 99 now.
Thunderous Wallop. They were taking the singles.. suddenly Taibu changes the mood with a dash down the track and lofts it over long-on
stays back to play the late cut to third man for couple of runs
leans forward to offer the full bat-face in defense

There is it folks. Taylor has reached his second ODI. He dabbed it to left of backward point and one look at Taibu and he was off. The dressing room celebrates. The ZImbabwe board officials celebrate. And the schoolboys are dancing in the stands!
around off stump, defended to point
short in length ,cut away to deep point
the slow bouncer on the leg stump line, swatted to short fine-leg for a single
short in length, punched uppishlly to left of short extra cover and Dilshan threw himself but couldn't reach
The slow bouncer.. Taylor was in two minds.. tries to pull but by then the ball had sailed over
tossed full outside off, driven to mid-off
spins in from outside off, pushed down the track
leans forward to work it behind square-leg
stretches forward to turn it to short midwicket. Just a single so far
And what a response from Brendan. The crowd roar. Taylor plays the reverse sweep - he leaned forward and swept it over backward point. Crash!
leans forward to nurdle it past square-leg
goes for the yorker, dug out towards mid-on for a quick single
taps this to square-leg and they cross over
short in length, on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
Stunner! Fabulicious! What a hit. It was a full delivery around off and he punched it over long-off. Classy. Stylish. Superb timing.
Fernando responds with a yorker, dug out towards third man. Just nine more now
fullish, just outside off, driven hard but straight to deep cover
Thwack! Full pitched on the leg and middle and Taibu whips it to deep midwicket for three runs
Wide outside the leg stump. Just four more now
good yorker on the middle and Taylor stabs it back down the track
the slow bouncer around off, swatted behind square-leg
Another wide down the leg side. He was trying the slower one but the release went awry
low full toss on the off stump line, pushed to mid-off for a single
Sizzling! Full delivery outside off and Taylor crashes it to the cover boundary. Zimbabwe win by 8 wickets.
